fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

bottle_rockets.name: Bottle Rockets
bottle_rockets.description: Make a rocket out of a bottle.

cat_works.name: Cat Works
cat_works.description: Shoot out of the business end of your cat.

ground_flower.name: Ground Bloom Flower
ground_flower.description: Fantastic ground spinner dances, swirls and changes color.

snaps.name: Snaps
snaps.description: Paper balls that are go BANG when they are thrown at something, preferably your cat.

smoke_balls.name: Smoke Balls
smoke_balls.description: Put these in your pants to make your balls disappear.

poppers.name: Poppers
poppers.description: Throw these at the feet of your cat for a good time!

snakes.name: Snakes
snakes.description: Snakes are hard pellets that are lit and produce a long carbon snake.

wheels.name: Wheels
wheels.description: A stationary device that spins and creates a circular ring of fire to throw your cat into.

bang.name: It Goes Bang
bang.description: Go big or go home with these explosives designed to blow A LOT of shit up.

heavy.name: Heavy Lifting
heavy.description: Want to see cars, buses, or cats fly? This product is right for you.

southern_drawl.name: Southern Drawl
southern_drawl.description: Hear the effects of this product for days, maybe put a week on it.

trojan_spartan.name: Trojan Spartan
trojan_spartan.description: For an explosion as big as King Leonidas's Queen experienced.

trojan_stinger.name: Trojan Stinger
trojan_stinger.description: For those times when you want multiple explosions.

fireline_ribbon.name: Fireline Ribbon
fireline_ribbon.description: Specially process for use with RTG perforating gun systems.

fireline_plastic.name: Fireline Plastic
fireline_plastic.description: Economical alternative intended for mild downhole conditions.

fireline_exposed.name: Fireline Exposed
fireline_exposed.description: Flexible HT/HP cord for use in caustic environments.
